Used by special operations units and law enforcement personnel, the PP-2000 personal defense weapon is often considered to be one of the best in its class. It is compact, lightweight and simple in design for increased reliability and simplified maintenance. Equipped with a Barska Electrosight, laser designator and tactical flashlight, there are few sidearms that'll have your back better than the "Operator".
